content.prompt: Works such as the one shown have been discovered primarily in

choices.label: cave systems, which were centers for ritual activity during the Neolithic period
wetlands, which were excavated as part of modern drainage efforts
ancient settlements, which included henges for astronomical observations
gravesites, where they were likely placed as part of funerary practices

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
